locations.title: Flying J Travel Center
locations.content: Flying J Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Very nice truck stop with limited truck parking, the restrooms and showers are very clean and well maintained. This love’s truck stop has a Hardee’s restaurant inside. The staff at this location are very nice and helpful to customers.

Today we hit a poor hawk on the way out to South Dakota. The inventory manager specifically and the rest of the staff were so helpful and gave us the number to a rescue that came and helped it get out as it was still alive. Everything in the store was clean and people were very friendly. Great store.

Today I decided to go shower at this place. After paying my $17, I was assigned bathroom number one. I enjoyed a warm shower, and upon exiting, I realized there were no towels. I had to wait a long time and use the hand dryer, as well as a …
